string-array.name: changelog_items
string-array.item: - added Quicksettings Toggles Color for on and off with romcontrol support
- added swipe up, swipe down and double tap feature to launcher with romcontrol support
- added expanded header modded clock with seconds option
- added colorize option for expanded header modded clock and date
- added option in romcontrol to switch on/off USB plug in/out wake up
- enabled touch key light duration in settings/display
- added Screencast to Reboot menue with toggle show/hide in romcontrol
- added Screenshot to Reboot menue with toggle show/hide in romcontrol
- added networktraffic to statusbar with settings in romcontrol
- changed device status to "Official" not custom thx @Aou @cstayton
